name: Space Duo
description:
Space shooter game where you protect your friend and become stronger. Don't get too far away from your friend. Unlimited waves.

Good Luck! Controls
  • WASD / Arrow keys to move
  • Click to pew pew
Credits

Music: Universe - SergePavkinMusic

Music Link: https://youtu.be/g7h5eT3X_XU

Install Instructions
  • Download .zip file.
  • Extract to empty folder.
  • Double click  Space Duo.exe.
